mechanics.condition: Character has Extra Attack (Level 5) class feature AND is on their turn
mechanics.outcome: Make two attacks instead of one

mechanics.condition: Character has Extra Attack (Level 11) class feature AND is on their turn
mechanics.outcome: Make three attacks instead of one

mechanics.condition: Character has Extra Attack (Level 20) class feature AND is on their turn
mechanics.outcome: Make four attacks instead of one

description_text: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level in this class and to four when you reach 20th level in this class.
